direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve subscription records but for different types of products (flexible vs. locked).
Both methods handle historical records with similar parameter structures and control flows.
Both methods access and retrieve data related to flexible products.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the request handler is required before making any API requests.
Subscribing to a flexible product should be tested before retrieving subscription records.
Both methods involve verifying records and handling similar exceptions.
